title: Easy Dutch apple cake
ingredients: ['100g butter', '200g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '190g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '175ml milk', '2 apples - peeled, cored and each cut into eight wedges', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
